description: This source file implements the DobbyInterface class for managing containers via Dobby proxy and IPC mechanisms in a C++ project. It includes container lifecycle management, event handling, and communication with external services like omi and Dobby daemon.

classes.name: DobbyInterface
classes.description: Class managing container lifecycle and events using Dobby proxy and IPC

methods.name: bool initialize(IEventHandler * eventHandler)
methods.description: Initializes the Dobby interface, sets up IPC, proxy, and event listeners.

methods.name: void terminate()
methods.description: Cleans up the interface, unregisters listeners.

methods.name: bool listContainers(string & containers,string & errorReason)
methods.description: Retrieves list of running containers.

methods.name: bool getContainerState(const string & containerId,Exchange::IOCIContainer::ContainerState & state,string & errorReason)
methods.description: Gets current state of a specified container.

methods.name: bool getContainerInfo(const string & containerId,string & info,string & errorReason)
methods.description: Retrieves detailed info for a container.

methods.name: bool startContainer(const string & containerId,const string & bundlePath,const string & command,const string & westerosSocket,int32_t & descriptor,string & errorReason)
methods.description: Starts a container from an OCI bundle.

methods.name: bool startContainerFromDobbySpec(const string & containerId,const string & dobbySpec,const string & command,const string & westerosSocket,int32_t & descriptor,string & errorReason)
methods.description: Starts a container based on a Dobby spec JSON.

methods.name: bool stopContainer(const string & containerId,bool force,string & errorReason)
methods.description: Stops a running container.

methods.name: bool pauseContainer(const string & containerId,string & errorReason)
methods.description: Pauses a container.

methods.name: bool resumeContainer(const string & containerId,string & errorReason)
methods.description: Resumes a paused container.

methods.name: bool hibernateContainer(const string & containerId,const string & options,string & errorReason)
methods.description: Hibernates a container.

methods.name: bool wakeupContainer(const string & containerId,string & errorReason)
methods.description: Wakes up a hibernated container.

methods.name: bool executeCommand(const string & containerId,const string & options,const string & command,string & errorReason)
methods.description: Executes a command inside a container.

methods.name: bool annotate(const string & containerId,const string & key,const string & value,string & errorReason)
methods.description: Adds an annotation to a container.

methods.name: bool removeAnnotation(const string & containerId,const string & key,string & errorReason)
methods.description: Removes an annotation from a container.

methods.name: bool mount(const string & containerId,const string & source,const string & target,const string & type,const string & options,string & errorReason)
methods.description: Mounts a filesystem in a container.

methods.name: bool unmount(const string & containerId,const string & target,string & errorReason)
methods.description: Unmounts a filesystem from a container.

methods.name: void onContainerStarted(int32_t descriptor,const std::string & name)
methods.description: Internal method to handle container start event.

methods.name: void onContainerStopped(int32_t descriptor,const std::string & name)
methods.description: Internal method to handle container stop event.

methods.name: void onContainerStateChanged(int32_t descriptor,const std::string & name,IDobbyProxyEvents::ContainerState dobbyContainerState)
methods.description: Internal method to handle container state change.

methods.name: void onVerityFailed(const std::string & name)
methods.description: Handles verification failure, stops containers accordingly.

methods.name: const int GetContainerDescriptorFromId(const std::string & containerId)
methods.description: Converts container OCI ID to Dobby internal descriptor.

methods.name: const std::string GetContainerIdFromDescriptor(const int descriptor)
methods.description: Converts internal descriptor to OCI container ID.

methods.name: const void stateListener(int32_t descriptor,const std::string & name,IDobbyProxyEvents::ContainerState state,const void * _this)
methods.description: Static callback for container state change events.

methods.name: const void omiErrorListener(const std::string & id,omi::IOmiProxy::ErrorType err,const void * _this)
methods.description: Static callback for OMI error events.

methods.name: DobbyInterface()
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: bool is_encrypted(const std::string & bundlePath)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: ~DobbyInterface()
methods.description: unavailable
